text: Liliane Juchli (19 October 1933 â€“ 30 November 2020) was a Swiss nurse and writer. She was a member of the Merciful Sisters of the Holy Cross. She was the main author of an important German-language nursing textbook which was called "the Juchli". She was born in Obersiggenthal, Switzerland. Juchli died in Bern, Switzerland from COVID-19 on 30 November 2020 at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Switzerland Category:Swiss writers Category:Nurses Category:People from Aargau
title: Liliane Juchli
